resources.string:
Shiva here. Ask me any Physics question from any entrance question paper, and I will try to give you the answer. 

All questions are public, and can be viewed by anyone who has this app. 

Turn on Data/WiFi to get latest updates. When not in use, keep the app in background to receive notifications. 

Ready?

Ask Shiva 

Made with ♥Ô∏è by Shiva Prasad. 
If you need any help, send an email to shivaprsdv@gmail.com. 

All the best! ☺
Specify the exam, year and question number in the field below:
e.g. JAM 2018 A23; or Pondi 2017 21; etc
Check if someone else has already asked the same question before submitting.
New answer notifications for Ask Shiva
